column1: 1. By clicking "I Agree" below, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this information, 18 or above and consent to participate in the survey under these terms.
column3: 3. How would you describe your financial management skills?
column4: 4. Have you used any budgeting apps before? If yes, which ones?
column5: 5. How easy was it to register for an account on the app?
column6: 6. How smooth was the login process?
column7: 7. Were the steps to connect your bank account clear and understandable?
column8: 8. How secure did you feel providing your bank account information?
column9: 9. How intuitive was the process of creating a new budget category?
column10: 10. Did the app provide sufficient options for budget customization?
column11: 11. How helpful were the visual representations of budget progress (e.g., progress bars)?
column12: 12. How accurate was the automatic categorization of your transactions?
column13: 13. Did the app provide meaningful insights into your spending habits?
column14: 14. Did you receive timely notifications when your budget limits were approaching or exceeded?
column15: 15. How informative and actionable were the notification messages?
column16: 16. Did the notifications help you stay on track with your budget?
column17: 17. How easy was it to navigate to your profile settings?
column18: 18. Did the app provide sufficient options for customizing your profile and preferences?
column19: 19. How straightforward was the process of managing linked accounts?
column20: 20. How would you rate the overall user experience of the app?
column21: 21. Did the app meet your expectations for a budgeting and payment tool?
column22: 22. How likely are you to recommend this app to others?
column23: 23. What did you like most about the app?
column24: 24. What areas of the app do you think need improvement?
column25: 25. Do you have any additional features or suggestions you would like to see in future versions of the app?
